auth.autoFillField: This field autofill with the email name
auth.recoveryAccountInformation: Forgot your account’s password or having trouble logging into your Team? Enter your email address and we’ll send you a recovery link.

forms.userNameInformation: The username must be 6 to 20 characters. Do not contain spaces or strange characters
